title: Skull
info: The Skull is an extremely rare vanity item that has a 0.2*1/500 (0.2%) chance of being dropped by Skeletons which are found in the Underground layer, or those spawned from a Skeleton Statue or a Bone Skeleton Statue (Bone Skeleton Statues only generate in Expert Mode worlds).
